title: National Waste Generation Data 2020-2024
description: Comprehensive dataset covering waste generation rates across 54 African countries, including urban and rural breakdowns, waste composition analysis, and temporal trends.

title: Recycling Facilities Database
description: Geospatial database of recycling and waste processing facilities across Africa, including capacity, materials processed, and operational status.

title: Waste Management Policy Repository
description: Compilation of national and municipal waste management policies, regulations, and strategic documents from African nations.

title: Plastic Waste Import-Export Statistics
description: Annual statistics on plastic waste imports and exports for African countries, tracking transboundary waste movements.
